about.summary: Miscellaneous functions for classification and visualization, e.g. regularized discriminant analysis, sknn() kernel-density naive Bayes,  an interface to 'svmlight' and stepclass() wrapper variable selection  for supervised classification, partimat() visualization of classification rules  and shardsplot() of cluster results as well as kmodes() clustering for categorical data,  corclust() variable clustering, variable extraction from different variable clustering models  and weight of evidence preprocessing.

name: r-klar
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.6-15" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-klar
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: klaR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/klaR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/klaR/klaR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5bfe5bc643f8a64b222317732c26e9f93be297cdc318a869f15cc9ab0d9e0fae

build:
  noarch: generic
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-combinat
    - r-questionr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-combinat
    - r-questionr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('klaR')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('klaR')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.statistik.tu-dortmund.de
  license: GPL-2
  summary: Miscellaneous functions for classification and visualization, e.g. regularized discriminant
    analysis, sknn() kernel-density naive Bayes,  an interface to 'svmlight' and stepclass()
    wrapper variable selection  for supervised classification, partimat() visualization
    of classification rules  and shardsplot() of cluster results as well as kmodes()
    clustering for categorical data,  corclust() variable clustering, variable extraction
    from different variable clustering models  and weight of evidence preprocessing.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - johanneskoester
    - bgruening
    - daler
    - jdblischak
    - cbrueffer
    - dbast
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
